item.description:
'Ello! Enthusiastically, I entreat everyone to enjoy exercises while eyeing Earth's euphoric enclaves on the Esplanade!

Phew, okay there aren't enough E words to keep that up.

Let's see what can inspire us this week outside! Take the red line to Charles MGH, and we'll meet outside the turnstiles in the station. Bring a blanket or lawn chair to lounge on while you people-watch and write.

If you get there too late to meet us at the station, call Kate at 440-864-5594 to find out where we are.

If there is more than a 60% chance of rain for the evening (ie if Mother Nature decides to bail again), we'll be at the Blue Shirt cafe in Davis.

Enraptured, everyone will etch exciting essays!
item.name: Exercises on the Esplanade
